NAME: Viraj Sawhney
ABOUT:
I joined Warburg Pincus in 2005 and am based in Mumbai. I am involved in the firm's investment advisory activities in India and evaluate opportunities in TMT/ Business services (including tech-enabled logistics, technology services,  BPO and TMT infrastructure). 

I am a director of :
- Bharti Telemedia, a leading DTH television service provider in India 
- Indecomm Digital Services, a global software OPD/ engineering business serving fast-growing tech companies and SaaS clients
- Vivtera, a global BPO platform that currently owns Arise, the leading North American work-from home contact centre platform
- Princeton Digital Ventures, an Asia-focused data center service provider 
-- Rivigo, a tech-enabled trucking asset owner and service provider
-- Ecom Express, an e-commerce focused express logistics service provider
-- Stellar Value Chain, an asset-light 3PL logistics business serving the B2B segment
-- Embassy Industrial Parks, a real estate platform JV seeking to build modern logistics and industrial parks across India 

Warburg Pincus is a leading global private equity firm focused on growth investing. The firm has more than $35 billion in assets under management. Its active portfolio of more than 120 companies is highly diversified by stage, sector and geography. Warburg Pincus is an experienced partner to management teams seeking to build durable companies with sustainable value. Founded in 1966, Warburg Pincus has raised 14 private equity funds that have invested more than $50 billion in over 720 companies in more than 35 countries. The firm is headquartered in New York and has offices in Amsterdam, Beijing, Frankfurt, Hong Kong, London, Luxembourg, Mumbai, Port Louis, San Francisco, São Paulo and Shanghai.
